death.attack.warpdrive.asphyxia.player: %1$s 被 %2$s 親吻導致不能呼吸了
death.attack.warpdrive.cold.player: %2$s 對 %1$s 使用了冰凍魔法
death.attack.warpdrive.shock.player: %2$s 對 %1$s 使出了十萬伏特
death.attack.warpdrive.teleportation.pla: %2$s 對 %1$s 使出了超時空傳送
death.attack.warpdrive.warm.player: %2$s 把 %1$s 變成了綠色香蕉
item.warpdrive.component.air_canister_em: §b右鍵單擊空氣發生器§r 填充虛空罐
item.warpdrive.component.raw_rubber.tool: Harvested from Jungle wood with Laser tree farm
item.warpdrive.atomic.electromagnetic_ce: Use a particle collider to fill me!
item.warpdrive.breathing.air_tank.toolti: §bRight click an Air generator§r to refill me
item.warpdrive.force_field.shape.tooltip: §b右鍵單擊投射器§r 升級\n§bShift加右鍵§r 降級
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.attra: 拉出斷路器方塊來修改數值。增加更多引力芯片來增加被作用的物品,實體, 怪物以及玩家。 增加一個廣域芯片來增加作用區域。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.break: 斷路器原件可以替代投射力場。 增加更多斷路器原件來升級采礦效率等級。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.camou: 偽裝力場 into 自定義方塊. 在頂部設置一個進階中轉器去確保僞裝。 增加更多僞裝芯片來升級速度。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.cooli: 凝結的方塊和實體。 增加更多冷卻芯片來增强效果。 增加一個廣域芯片來增加作用區域。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.fusio: 重疊力場以共享相同的波束和頻率的網絡
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.heati: 加熱方塊或者實體。增加更多熔融芯片來增强效果。 增加一個廣域芯片來增加反應區域。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.inver: §4工作正在進行時\n更改作用的區域。  用於定位實體或地形。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.item_: 增加機械的接口。 添加更多引力升級芯片或者斷路器芯片。 增加斥力芯片以提供進行放置穩定升級芯片。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.pumpi: §4工作正在進行時\n往力場位置泵送流體。 添加更多泵升級以驅動具有較高粘度流體的流體，如熔岩。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.range: 增加投射器的最大範圍。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.repul: 通過穩定升級壓縮存儲的物品。增加更多斥力芯片來增加被作用的物品, 實體, 怪物以及玩家。 添加一個廣域芯片以增加作用範圍。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.shock: 電氣塊和實體。 添加更多震蕩芯片以提高效果。 增加一個廣域芯片來增加作用區域。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.thick: 增加力場的厚度。 添加更多加厚芯片以增加效果，最多增加一倍。
item.warpdrive.force_field.upgrade.toolt: §b右鍵單擊投射器§r 來升級它
§b右鍵單擊繼電器§r 來升級它
item.warpdrive.tool.ship_token.tooltip.u: 將水晶封裝在船上 '%1$s'\n§b啓動掃描力場§r 來建造你的船隻。
item.warpdrive.tool.tuning_driver.toolti: §bRight click a block§r to tune its crystals\n§bSneak§r to retrieve its value\n§bRight click air§r to change mode
§b右鍵單擊一個方塊§r 以調整其水晶\n§b潛行§r 以調節交替水晶
item.warpdrive.tool.wrench.tooltip: §bRight click a block§r to rotate it
Controls one or more particle accelerators.\nShall be placed next to an electromagnet.
block.warpdrive.atomic.accelerator_contr: Control accelerator nodes like collider, input and output.\nShall be placed exactly 1 block away from a void shell.\nStore results in any directly connected storage.
block.warpdrive.atomic.chiller.basic.too: Progressively cooldown electromagnets from a connected particle accelerator.\nShall be placed next to an electromagnet.
Progressively cooldown electromagnets from a connected particle accelerator.\nShall be placed next to an electromagnet.
Progressively cooldown electromagnets from a connected particle accelerator.\nShall be placed next to an electromagnet.
block.warpdrive.atomic.electromagnet.bas: Accelerate, focus and orient particles in the attached Void Shell.
Same a Plain Electromagnet, except you can see through it.
block.warpdrive.atomic.electromagnet.adv: Accelerate, focus and orient particles in the attached Void Shell.
Same a Plain Electromagnet, except you can see through it.
block.warpdrive.atomic.electromagnet.sup: Accelerate, focus and orient particles in the attached Void Shell.
Same a Plain Electromagnet, except you can see through it.
block.warpdrive.atomic.particles_collide: Deviates particles to collide against each others or a fixed target.\nRequires 12 blocks and an Accelerator control point to collect results.
block.warpdrive.atomic.particles_injecto: Inject items or particles from a connected storage into a Basic Accelerator.
Provides 2 empty channels for particles to travel inside an accelerator setup.\nConnects only horizontally to other Void Shells.
Same as a Plain Void Shell, except you can see particles moving through it.
Basic Air Generator / 空氣發生器
Advanced Air Generator / 空氣發生器
Superior Air Generator / 空氣發生器
block.warpdrive.detection.warp_isolation: Place up to %5$d m away from a ship core\nUsing %1$d to %3$d isolation blocks will absorb %2$d %% to %4$d %% of radar waves
block.warpdrive.detection.siren_industri: 距離%1$d格範圍内有警報器發出了警報。
block.warpdrive.detection.siren_military: 距離%1$d格範圍内有空襲警報器發出了警報。
block.warpdrive.detection.speaker.toolti: Sends messages to players up to %1$d m away.
block.warpdrive.detection.virtual_assist: Detects messages from players up to %1$d m away.
支持在其網絡內共享最多1個力場升級
block.warpdrive.force_field.relay.advanc: 支持在其網絡內共享最多1個力場升級
block.warpdrive.force_field.relay.superi: 支持在其網絡內共享最多1個力場升級
block.warpdrive.movement.ship_controller: Optional block to control a ship core remotely. Attach a computer to open the user interface.
Remote controller is for remote usage, also they're optional now...
block.warpdrive.movement.ship_core.toolt: Defines your ship center. Connecting an energy source will charge the core. Attach a computer to open the user interface.
block.warpdrive.movement.ship_core.bound: Bounding box display have been disabled.
Bounding box display is now enabled. Only you can see it.\n§bSneak right-click the Ship core§r to disable it.
block.warpdrive.movement.ship_core.toolt:
Size is up to %1$d x %1$d x %1$d blocks.
Mass is %2$d to %3$d tons.
Mass on a planet is %4$d tons max.
Mass to engage warp is %5$d tons min.
block.warpdrive.movement.transporter_bea: §bRight click a Transporter Core§r to set its remote location.\n§bSneak§r to retrieve its signature.\n§bPlace as a block§r to trigger emergency transportation.
block.warpdrive.hull.basic.omnipanel.lig: Light Blue Stained Basic Hull Omnipanel
block.warpdrive.hull.basic.slab.lightBlu: Light Blue Stained Basic Hull Slab
Light Blue Stained Advanced Hull Omnipanel
block.warpdrive.hull.advanced.slab.light: Light Blue Stained Advanced Hull Slab
Light Blue Stained Superior Hull Omnipanel
block.warpdrive.hull.superior.slab.light: Light Blue Stained Superior Hull Slab

warpdrive.core_signature.set_not_support: You can't change the signature of a %3$s.
warpdrive.core_signature.status_line.def: Signature is %1$d.\n§bRight-click a remote controller§r to apply this signature.

warpdrive.tooltip.item_tag.breathing_hel: §b空間呼吸§r 正在從您的庫存消耗IC2的壓縮空氣囊。
§bSpace breathing§r consuming Air canisters and IC2 Compressed air cells from your inventory.
warpdrive.upgrade.result.not_enough_upgr: 您需要至少1個才能升級此塊。
warpdrive.upgrade.result.invalid_upgrade: 這不是升級此方塊的有效項。

此升級僅適用於投射器。
warpdrive.upgrade.result.valid_upgrades: 此方塊塊的有效升級包括: %1$s. @TODO 尚未執行。

warpdrive.accelerator.guide.low_power.no: Energy storage is too low; we need at least %1$d %3$s to continue operation but can only store %2$d %3$s.
warpdrive.accelerator.guide.low_power.ac: We're running out of power chief (%1$s > %2$s %3$s), particles are on the loose, prepare for massive irradiation!
warpdrive.accelerator.guide.low_power.no: We need more power to start the accelerator!
warpdrive.accelerator.guide.no_chiller: No chiller could be found for this accelerator!

warpdrive.builder.guide.ship_materializa: Stand by for ship materialization in %2$d...
warpdrive.builder.guide.ship_deployed: Ship deployed. Teleporting captain to the main deck...
warpdrive.builder.guide.welcome_aboard: Welcome aboard captain! Use the computer to get moving...

Integrity down to %1$d%%: missing channeling coil(s) towards %2$s
warpdrive.cloaking_core.missing_projecti: Integrity down to %1$d%%: missing projecting coil(s) towards %2$s
warpdrive.cloaking_core.low_power: 僞裝失效了，我們需要更多的能量！艦長！
warpdrive.cloaking_core.cloaking: A 層 %1$d 僞裝目前正確覆蓋 %2$d 區域！
warpdrive.energy.side.changed_to_input: %1$s 側面變為能量輸入模式!
warpdrive.energy.side.changed_to_output: %1$s 側面變為能量輸出模式!
warpdrive.energy.side.changed_to_disable: %1$s 側面變為能量禁用模式!
warpdrive.force_field.guide.low_power: 我們的能量用完了，艦長！減少消耗，或讓引擎長提高我們的輸出！
warpdrive.laser.status_line.missing_lase: No laser medium detected, valid sides are %1$d.
warpdrive.laser_tree_farm.status_line.ta: Tapping trees, harvesting all with silktouch
Tapping trees, harvesting logs with silktouch
warpdrive.monitor.viewing_camera: 查看攝影機 %2$d, %3$d, %4$d 在視頻頻道 %1$d
warpdrive.particle.ion.tooltip: Produced by colliding a particle bunch in a basic accelerator
warpdrive.particle.proton.tooltip: Produced by colliding a particle bunch in an advanced accelerator
warpdrive.particle.antimatter.tooltip: Produced by colliding a particle bunch in a superior accelerator
warpdrive.particle.strange_matter.toolti: Produced by colliding 2 particle bunches in a superior accelerator
warpdrive.security_station.guide.player_: You're now registered on this security station.\nRegistered players are %1$s
You've been unregistered from this security station.\nAttached players are %1$s
_comment: Note for translators: you want to keep each line shorter than 50 characters so that it fits on computer screens.
warpdrive.ship.guide.cooling_countdown: Ship core is cooling down... %1$d s to go...
warpdrive.ship.guide.warming_up: Ship core is warming up... %1$d s to go...
warpdrive.ship.guide.warp_field_overlapp: Own warp field contains another ship.\nDisable ship core %1$s to continue.
warpdrive.ship.guide.cloaking_field_over: Core is cloaked.\nDisable cloak to continue.
warpdrive.ship.guide.no_dimension_set: Ship has no dimension set yet.
warpdrive.ship.guide.too_large_side_for_: Ship is too large, max is %1$d m per side.\nUpgrade ship core or reduce span.
warpdrive.ship.guide.too_much_mass_for_p: Ship is too big for a planet.\nReduce your mass to %1$d t or less.
warpdrive.ship.guide.insufficient_mass_f: Ship is too light, min is %1$d t.\nDowngrade ship core or increase mass.
warpdrive.ship.guide.too_much_mass_for_t: Ship is too heavy, max is %1$d t.\nUpgrade ship core or reduce your mass.
warpdrive.ship.guide.insufficient_mass_f: Ship is too light to engage Alcubierre drive.\nIncrease your mass to %1$d t or more.
warpdrive.ship.guide.jumpgate_is_too_far: Ship is not inside a jumpgate.
warpdrive.ship.guide.jumpgate_partially_: Ship is only %.1f%% inside a jumpgate.\nSorry, we'll loose too much crew as is.
warpdrive.ship.guide.jumpgate_blocked: Destination gate is blocked by obstacles.
warpdrive.ship.guide.target_outside_plan: Target position is outside planet border!\nWorld borders are (%1$d %2$d %3$d) to (%4$d %5$d %6$d).
warpdrive.ship.guide.invalid_y_coordinat: Invalid Y coordinate(s), check ship dimensions...
warpdrive.ship.guide.overlapping_source_: Target is too close. Increase jump distance to continue.
warpdrive.ship.guide.block_not_ready_for: On-board block %1$s at (%2$d %3$d %4$d) is not ready.
warpdrive.ship.guide.ship_snagged2: Sneak right click the ship core to see your ship dimensions, then update your ship dimensions.
warpdrive.ship.guide.save_exception: Exception while saving ship block %1$s.\nCheck console for details.
warpdrive.ship.guide.too_many_chunks_to_: Ship extends over %1$d chunks.\nMax is set to %2$d in config/forgeChunkLoading.cfg.
warpdrive.ship.guide.max_chunkloading: Close the game, update config/forgeChunkLoading.cfg, then try again.
warpdrive.ship.guide.chunkloading_reject: Chunkloading rejected in target world %s. Aborting.
warpdrive.ship.guide.no_celestial_object: No star system exists in %1$s (%2$d), there's nowhere to exit hyperspace!
warpdrive.ship.guide.no_star_system_in_r: Ship won't survive in deep space.\nClosest star system is ~%1$d m away (%2$d %3$d %4$d) to (%5$d %6$d %7$d).
warpdrive.ship.guide.exception_loading_d: Unable to load dimension %1$d.\nCheck console for a missing mod or misconfiguration.
warpdrive.ship.guide.unable_to_reach_hyp: Unable to engage Alcubierre drive on a planet.\nGet into orbit, then try again.
Current location has no hyperspace connection.\nThere's no parent defined for %1$s (%2$d).
warpdrive.ship.guide.unable_to_reach_spa: Current location as no space connection.\nThere's no parent defined for %1$s (%2$d).
Ship is outside planet border.\nClosest transition area is ~%1$d m away (%2$d %3$d %4$d) to (%5$d %6$d %7$d).
warpdrive.ship.guide.no_celestial_object: There's nowhere to land.\nNo planet exists in %1$s (%2$d).
warpdrive.ship.guide.unable_to_land_outs: Ship isn't orbiting of planet, unable to land!\nClosest planet is %1$d m away (%2$d %3$d %4$d) to (%5$d %6$d %7$d).
warpdrive.ship.guide.unable_to_land_virt: Celestial object %1$s is out of reach.\nIt's either a decorative planet or a server misconfiguration.
warpdrive.ship.guide.ship_collision: Collision detected around (%1$d %2$d %3$d).\nSend a maintenance team to check for damages!
warpdrive.ship.guide.moving_too_high: Ship core is moving too high.
warpdrive.ship.guide.moving_too_low: Ship core is moving too low.
warpdrive.ship.guide.schematic_not_found: Schematic not found or unknown error reading it: '%1$s'.
warpdrive.ship.status_line.isolation: %1$d 主動隔離塊由 %2$s%% 吸收。
warpdrive.teleportation.guide.no_safe_sp: No safe spot found to summon player %1$s
warpdrive.transporter.status_line.missin: Missing or invalid containment for scanner %1$s.
warpdrive.transporter_signature.get_miss: Transporter room has no signature yet!
warpdrive.transporter_signature.get_same: Transporter beacon is already linked to %1$s.
warpdrive.transporter_signature.get: Transporter beacon is now linked to %1$s.
warpdrive.transporter_signature.set_miss: Transporter beacon needs to be linked first!
warpdrive.transporter_signature.set_same: Transporter room is already linked to %1$s.
warpdrive.transporter_signature.set: Transporter room is now linked to %1$s.

warpdrive.world_border.outside: You're %1$d m outside the world border...
warpdrive.world_border.portal_denied: Portal opening cancelled to prevent a certain death!
